identity.name: SKP Pro - The Purple Prism
identity.description: A high-performance university performance management system that breaks the boring 'admin panel' stereotype with deep violet accents, glassmorphism, and fluid interactions.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-semibold hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-medium hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-violet-50 hover:text-violet-700 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.interactive: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-100 p-6 cursor-pointer hover:border-violet-200 hover:ring-2 hover:ring-violet-50 transition-all

inputs.base: flex h-11 w-full rounded-lg border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-violet-500 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.wrapper: w-full overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-slate-200 bg-white shadow-sm

login_hero.usage: Right side of split login screen, overlaid with glass card

login_bg_texture.usage: Background for the login illustration container

setup: Install fonts in index.css using the @import url provided.
Update tailwind.config.js with the custom colors and font families.
Ensure 'lucide-react' is used for all icons.
Ensure 'recharts' is used for all charts.
Ensure 'sonner' is used for all notifications.
layout_rules: LOGIN PAGE: Split 50/50. Left side is clean white with the form. Right side is the 'login_bg_texture' with the 'login_hero' image floating in the center.
DASHBOARD: Use a Sidebar layout. Sidebar must be sticky and use the 'glassmorphism' style if possible, or clean white with a border-r.
HEADER: Minimalist. Just the page title and user profile dropdown. No search bar unless necessary.
CONTENT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy. Don't just stack cards. Make some span 2 columns.
anti_ai_rules: DO NOT use standard gray borders (gray-200). Use slate-100 or violet-100 for a cleaner look.
DO NOT center text in cards unless it's a specific stat. Left align is better for readability.
DO NOT use pure black (#000000). Use the semantic text colors defined above.
Add 'active:scale-95' to all buttons to give them a tactile feel.

universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements MUST have a data-testid attribute (kebab-case).
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure all colors meet WCAG AA contrast ratios. Use focus-visible rings for keyboard navigation.
universal_guidelines.motion: Use 'framer-motion' or Tailwind 'transition-all' for smooth hover states. No instant color changes.
